---
id: query-group-info
title: "查询群组资料"
description: "通过该接口查询群资料，包含群组名称、群组公告、群组头像、群组禁言信息、群组规格限制、群组创建时间和群组属性。"
api: 
info_path: core_products/zim/zh/docs_zim_server_zh/group/open-api-desc
---

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>查询群组资料</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/"}></MethodEndpoint>


通过该接口查询群资料，包含群组名称、群组公告、群组头像、群组禁言信息、群组规格限制、群组创建时间和群组属性。

<Note title="说明">调用频率限制：20 次/秒。</Note>

## Request
<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Query Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"Action","in":"query","description":"> 接口原型参数\n>\n> https://zim-api.zego.im/?Action=QueryGroupInfo\n","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","enum":["QueryGroupInfo"]},"style":"form","explode":true}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"AppId","in":"query","description":"💡公共参数。应用 Id，由 ZEGO 分配的用户唯一凭证。可从 <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://console.zego.im/\">ZEGO 控制台</a> 获取。","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"uint32"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"SignatureNonce","in":"query","description":"💡公共参数。16 位 16 进制随机字符串（8 字节随机数的 hex 编码）。生成算法可参考 <a href=\"/zim-server/accessing-server-apis#signature-example\">签名示例</a>。","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"Timestamp","in":"query","description":"💡公共参数。当前 Unix 时间戳，单位为秒。生成算法可参考 <a href=\"/zim-server/accessing-server-apis#signature-example\">签名示例</a>，最多允许 10 分钟的误差。","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"SignatureVersion","in":"query","description":"💡公共参数。签名版本号。","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","default":"2.0","enum":["2.0"]}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"Signature","in":"query","description":"💡公共参数。签名，用于验证请求的合法性。请参考[签名机制](/zim-server/accessing-server-apis#signature-mechanism)生成。","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details>

ForbidList 不会同时存在。\n","example":true}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"ForbidList"} required={false} schemaName={"number[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"array","items":{"type":"number"},"description":"被禁言的群组角色。\n- 1：群主。\n- 2：群管理员。\n- 3：群成员。\n- 其他值：您自定义的群组角色，一般建议大于 100。\n","example":[2,3]}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={true} schema={{"type":"number","description":"群成员人数上限。","example":100}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"JoinMode"} required={false} schemaName={"number"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"number","description":"加入群组的模式：\n- 0：无需验证，任何人可以直接加入群组。\n- 1：用户需发起入群申请，群主或群管理员批准后，该用户才能加入群组。\n- 2：外部用户需经群内成员邀请方可入群。\n","example":1}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"InviteMode"} required={false} schemaName={"number"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"number","description":"邀请模式：\n- 0：所有群成员都能邀请外部用户入群。\n- 1：只有群主或者群管理员可以发起邀请。\n","example":1}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"BeInvitedMode"} required={false} schemaName={"number"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"number","description":"受邀请模式：\n- 0：可以直接邀请外部用户入群，无需对方同意。\n- 1：邀请某人加入群组后，需要对方同意。\n","example":1}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"NumberMessage"} required={false} schemaName={"number"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"number","description":"新成员入群后可拉取的历史消息数目。","example":100}}></SchemaItem></div></details></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"ForbidExpireTime"} required={false} schemaName={"number"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"number","description":"禁言结束的 Unix
